tweet: ✨ Untraceable #crypto with @monero grade privacy @HavenXHV has been integrated with @BandProtocol   ✨ $BAND will secure the burning and minting mechanism of $XHV private stablecoin, $xUSD  ➡️ DETAILS  https://t.co/xg26qEXVOR #DeFi #DefiNews #SmartLiquidity #BAND_XHV_INTEGRATION
